com.genband.kandy.api.services.chats

Interface IKandyFileItem

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IKandyMediaItem
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    IKandyAudioItem, IKandyContactItem, IKandyImageItem, IKandyVideoItem

    public interface IKandyFileItem
extends IKandyMediaItem
    This interface represents the generic file, other Kandy File types that inherit from this interface: IKandyVideoItem, IKandyAudioItem, IKandyContactItem, IKandyImageItem

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      long getDateAdded()
      Get creation date of the file in milliseconds - since 1970
      long getDateModified()
      Get modified date of the file in milliseconds - since 1970
      String getDisplayName()
      Get file display name
      String getFileExtension() 
      Uri getLocalDataUri()
      Get local Uri of the file in the filesystem where the file is placed, or will be placed
      Uri getLocalThumbnailUri()
      Get local Uri of the thumbnail file in the filesystem where the file is placed, or will be placed thumbnail exists for the images, videos and contact's vcard if contact has image in addressbook
      long getMediaSize()
      The size of the media file in bytes
      UUID getServerUUID()
      Get UUID of the FILE with which it stored on a server
      String getTitle()
      Get file title
      KandyTransferProgress getTransferProgress()
      Hold information on the transfer process
      void setServerUUID(UUID serverDataUri)
      Set the UUID of the FILE key as it stored on a server

      • Methods inherited from interface com.genband.kandy.api.services.chats.IKandyMediaItem

        getAdditionalData, getMediaItemType, getMessage, getMimeType, setAdditionalData
